alert.note: Alert for Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 7:21PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Todd and southwestern Tripp Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 821 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Littleburg, or 14 miles north of Valentine, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Littleburg around 825 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Keyapaha. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
